R

randomBoost(Team, int, Difficulty) - Static method in class main.RandomEvent
Randomly applies a boost to members of a team based on a probability constant influenced by current day and faint count
RANDOMBOOSTDESC - Static variable in class items.ItemConstants
Constant defining the description of random boost item
RANDOMBOOSTFEEDBACK - Static variable in class items.ItemConstants
Feedback message when random boost is used
RandomEvent - Class in main
Contains all random events that occur during the game.
RandomEvent() - Constructor for class main.RandomEvent
 
RandomEventConstants - Class in main
Class storing constants for probabilities of Random Events
RandomEventConstants() - Constructor for class main.RandomEventConstants
 
randomMonsterJoin(Team, Difficulty) - Static method in class main.RandomEvent
Randomly add a monster to a team based on a probability constant influenced by available spaces in team
randomMonsterLeave(Team, Difficulty) - Static method in class main.RandomEvent
Randomly removes monsters from a team based on a probability constant influenced by faint count
RandomStatBoost - Class in items
An item that increases a random stat of a Monster.
RandomStatBoost(Rarity) - Constructor for class items.RandomStatBoost
Constructor for RandomStatBoost item.
RandomTrigger - Class in items
An item that gives a Monster a random Trigger for their ability
RandomTrigger() - Constructor for class items.RandomTrigger
Constructor for RandomTrigger Item, the Rarity of this item is always Rarity.RARE.
RANDOMTRIGGERDESC - Static variable in class items.ItemConstants
Constant defining the description of random trigger item
RANDOMTRIGGERFEEDBACK - Static variable in class items.ItemConstants

RARE - Enum constant in enum class main.Rarity
Rare Rarity
RAREBUYPRICE - Static variable in class items.ItemConstants

RARESELLPRICE - Static variable in class items.ItemConstants

RARESELLPRICE - Static variable in class monsters.MonsterConstants

RARESTATBOOST - Static variable in class items.ItemConstants

Rarity - Enum Class in main

removeGold(int) - Method in class main.Player
Decreases the amount of gold the player has
removeItem(Item) - Method in class main.Player
Removes the given item from the player's inventory If the item is not in the inventory, then false is returned
removeMonster(int) - Method in class main.Team

restore() - Method in class monsters.Monster
